VNC Viewer Specification

The VNC Viewer application is a VNC client.

The VNC Viewer is a VNC client. It connects to a remote VNC server, and allows the machine running the server to be controlled by the client.

Status: RT

Use Cases
  • Interacting with PCs that do not provide remote terminal access

    Some operating systems are only able to be driven via their GUI. The user is able to operate such an operating system by using the VNC Client application.

Features
  • Full Screen: Set the VNC Client window to fullscreen.
  • Zoom: Zoom out x2.
  • Transport Encoding: Multiple options (Hextile, CoRRE, RRE, CopyRectangle) available.
  • Screen Refresh: Configurable refresh rate at 1 millisecond resolution.

Prerequisites
  • Server: remote VNC Server required.
